CVE-2017-0358.title: NTFS-3G: Privilege escalation — GLSA 201702-10
CVE-2017-0358.subTitle: A vulnerability in NTFS-3G allows local users to gain root privileges.
CVE-2017-0358.background: NTFS-3G is a stable, full-featured, read-write NTFS driver for various operating systems.
CVE-2017-0358.body: The NTFS-3G driver does not properly clear environment variables before invoking mount or umount.
CVE-2017-0358.extra: This flaw is similar to the vulnerability described in “GLSA-201701-19” and “GLSA-201603-04” referenced below but is now implemented in the NTFS-3G driver itself.

CVE-2017-0381.title: Opus: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201702-21
CVE-2017-0381.subTitle: A vulnerability in Opus could cause memory corruption.
CVE-2017-0381.background: Opus is a totally open, royalty-free, highly versatile audio codec.
CVE-2017-0381.body: A large NLSF values could cause the stabilization code in silk/NLSF_stabilize.c to wrap-around and have the last value in NLSF_Q15[] to be negative, close to -32768.
CVE-2017-0381.extra: Under normal circumstances, the code will simply read from the wrong table resulting in an unstable LPC filter. The filter would then go through the LPC stabilization code at the end of silk_NLSF2A().

CVE-2017-0663.title: libxml2: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201711-01
CVE-2017-0663.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libxml2, the worst of which could result in the execution of arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-0663.background: libxml2 is the XML (eXtended Markup Language) C parser and toolkit initially developed for the Gnome project.
CVE-2017-0663.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libxml2. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-0663.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to process a specially crafted XML document, could remotely execute arbitrary code, conduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-1000368.title: sudo: Privilege escalation — GLSA 201710-04
CVE-2017-1000368.subTitle: A vulnerability in sudo allows local users to gain root privileges.
CVE-2017-1000368.background: sudo (su “do”) allows a system administrator to delegate authority to give certain users (or groups of users) the ability to run some (or all) commands as root or another user while providing an audit trail of the commands and their arguments.
CVE-2017-1000368.body: The fix present in app-admin/sudo-1.8.20_p1 (GLSA 201705-15) was incomplete as it did not address the problem of a command with a newline in the name.
CVE-2017-1000368.extra: A local attacker could execute arbitrary code with root privileges.

CVE-2017-1000433.extra: A remote attacker could bypass security restrictions and access any application which is using PySAML2 for authentication.

CVE-2017-12967.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to compile/execute a specially crafted ELF, tekhex, PE, or binary file, could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-2615.title: QEMU: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201702-28
CVE-2017-2615.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in QEMU, the worst of which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code on the host system.
CVE-2017-2615.background: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.
CVE-2017-2615.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in QEMU. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-2615.extra: A local attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code with privileges of QEMU process on the host, gain privileges on the host system, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2017-2615.title: Xen: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201702-27
CVE-2017-2615.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Xen, the worst of which could lead to the execution of arbitrary code on the host system.
CVE-2017-2615.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xen. Please review the CVE identifiers and Xen Security Advisory referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-2615.extra: A local attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code with privileges of Xen (QEMU) process on the host, gain privileges on the host system, cause a Denial of Service condition, or obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2017-2620.title: QEMU: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201704-01
CVE-2017-2620.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in QEMU, the worst of which could the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution, or cause a Denial of Service condition.
CVE-2017-2620.background: QEMU is a generic and open source machine emulator and virtualizer.
CVE-2017-2620.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in QEMU. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-2620.extra: Remote server can cause a crash in the client causing execution of arbitrary code, and a Denial of Service within the QEMU process. Remote or Local users within a guest QEMU environment can cause a Denial of Service condition of the QEMU guest process.

CVE-2017-2620.title: Xen: Privilege Escalation — GLSA 201703-07
CVE-2017-2620.subTitle: A vulnerability in Xen's bundled QEMU version might allow privilege escalation.
CVE-2017-2620.body: In CIRRUS_BLTMODE_MEMSYSSRC mode the bitblit copy routine cirrus_bitblt_cputovideo fails to check wethehr the specified memory region is safe.
CVE-2017-2620.extra: A local attacker could potentially execute arbitrary code with privileges of Xen (QEMU) process on the host, gain privileges on the host system, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-2624.title: X.Org Server: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201710-30
CVE-2017-2624.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in X.Org Server the worst of which could allow a local attacker to replace shared memory segments.
CVE-2017-2624.background: The X.Org project provides an open source implementation of the X Window System.
CVE-2017-2624.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in X.Org Server. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.
CVE-2017-2624.extra: A local attacker could cause a global buffer overflow or a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-2624.title: X.Org: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201704-03
CVE-2017-2624.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in X.Org server and libraries, the worse of which allowing local attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-2624.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in X.Org server and libraries. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-2624.extra: A local or remote users can utilize the vulnerabilities to attach to the X.Org session as a user and execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2017-2630.title: QEMU: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201704-01
CVE-2017-2630.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in QEMU, the worst of which could the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-2640.title: Pidgin: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201706-10
CVE-2017-2640.subTitle: A vulnerability in Pidgin might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-2640.background: Pidgin is a GTK Instant Messenger client for a variety of instant messaging protocols.
CVE-2017-2640.body: Joseph Bisch discovered that Pidgin incorrectly handled certain xml messages.
CVE-2017-2640.extra: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted instant message, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the Pidgin process.

CVE-2017-2807.title: ledger: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 202004-05
CVE-2017-2807.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ledger, the worst of which could result in the arbitrary execution of code.
CVE-2017-2807.background: Ledger is a powerful, double-entry accounting system that is accessed from the UNIX command-line.
CVE-2017-2807.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ledger. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-2807.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted file using ledger, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-3735.title: OpenSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201712-03
CVE-2017-3735.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in OpenSSL, the worst of which may lead to a Denial of Service condition.
CVE-2017-3735.background: OpenSSL is a robust, commercial-grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols.
CVE-2017-3735.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSSL. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.
CVE-2017-3735.extra: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition, recover a private key in unlikely circumstances, circumvent security restrictions to perform unauthorized actions, or gain access to sensitive information.

CVE-2017-5006.title: Chromium: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201701-66
CVE-2017-5006.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in the Chromium web browser, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-5006.background: Chromium is an open-source browser project that aims to build a safer, faster, and more stable way for all users to experience the web.
CVE-2017-5006.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in the Chromium web browser. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-5006.extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, obtain sensitive information, bypass security restrictions, or perform cross-site scripting (XSS).

CVE-2017-5330.title: Ark: Unintended execution of scripts and executable files — GLSA 201701-69
CVE-2017-5330.subTitle: A vulnerability in Ark might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-5330.background: Ark is a graphical file compression/decompression utility with support for multiple formats.
CVE-2017-5330.body: A vulnerability was discovered in how Ark handles executable files while browsing a compressed archive. A user could unintentionally execute a malicious script which has the executable bit set inside of the archive. This is due to Ark not displaying what files are executable and running the associated applications for the file type upon execution.
CVE-2017-5330.extra: A remote attacker, by coercing a user to browse a malicious archive file within Ark and execute certain files, could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user.

CVE-2017-5398.background: Mozilla Firefox is a popular open-source web browser from the Mozilla Project.
CVE-2017-5398.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Mozilla Firefox. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-5398.extra: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, bypass access restriction, access otherwise protected information, or spoof content via multiple vectors.

CVE-2017-5400.background: Mozilla Thunderbird is a popular open-source email client from the Mozilla project.
CVE-2017-5400.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Mozilla Thunderbird. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-5400.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted email or web page, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, spoof content or obtain sensitive information.

CVE-2017-5436.title: Graphite: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201706-25
CVE-2017-5436.subTitle: An out-of-bounds write in Graphite might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-5436.background: Graphite is a “smart font” system developed specifically to handle the complexities of lesser-known languages of the world.
CVE-2017-5436.body: An out-of-bounds write has been found in the Graphite 2 library.
CVE-2017-5436.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted document using Graphite or an application linked against Graphite library, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-7030.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in WebkitGTK+. Please review the references below for details.
CVE-2017-7030.extra: A remote attacker could execute arbitrary code, cause a Denial of Service condition, bypass intended memory-read restrictions, conduct a timing side-channel attack to bypass the Same Origin Policy, obtain sensitive information, or spoof the address bar.

CVE-2017-7178.title: Deluge: Remote execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201703-06
CVE-2017-7178.subTitle: A vulnerability in Deluge might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-7178.body: A CSRF vulnerability was discovered in the web UI of Deluge.
CVE-2017-7178.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user currently logged in into Deluge web UI to visit a malicious web page which uses forged requests to make Deluge download and install a Deluge plug-in provided by the attacker. The plug-in can then execute arbitrary code as the user running Deluge.

CVE-2017-7207.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GPL Ghostscript. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for additional information.

CVE-2017-7209.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to compile/execute a specially crafted ELF, tekhex, PE, or binary file, could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-7601.background: The TIFF library contains encoding and decoding routines for the Tag Image File Format. It is called by numerous programs, including GNOME and KDE applications, to interpret TIFF images.
CVE-2017-7601.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in LibTIFF. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.
CVE-2017-7601.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing the user to process a specially crafted TIFF file, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, obtain sensitive information, or have other unspecified impacts.

CVE-2017-7614.title: Binutils: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201709-02
CVE-2017-7614.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Binutils, the worst of which may allow remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition.
CVE-2017-7614.background: The GNU Binutils are a collection of tools to create, modify and analyse binary files. Many of the files use BFD, the Binary File Descriptor library, to do low-level manipulation.
CVE-2017-7614.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Binutils. Please review References for additional information.
CVE-2017-7614.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to compile/execute a specially crafted ELF file, PE File, or binary file, could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-7659.title: Apache: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201710-32
CVE-2017-7659.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Apache, the worst of which may result in the loss of secrets.
CVE-2017-7659.background: The Apache HTTP server is one of the most popular web servers on the Internet.
CVE-2017-7659.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Apache. Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.
CVE-2017-7659.extra: The Optionsbleed vulnerability can leak arbitrary memory from the server process that may contain secrets. Additionally attackers may cause a Denial of Service condition, bypass authentication, or cause information loss.

CVE-2017-7692.title: SquirrelMail: Remote Code Execution — GLSA 201709-13
CVE-2017-7692.subTitle: A vulnerability in SquirrelMail might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-7692.background: SquirrelMail is a webmail package written in PHP. It supports IMAP and SMTP and can optionally be installed with SQL support.
CVE-2017-7692.body: It was discovered that the sendmail.cf file is mishandled in a popen call.
CVE-2017-7692.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open an e-mail attachment, could execute arbitrary shell commands.

CVE-2017-7870.background: LibreOffice is a powerful office suite; its clean interface and powerful tools let you unleash your creativity and grow your productivity.
CVE-2017-7870.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in LibreOffice. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-7870.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted file using LibreOffice, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-7875.title: feh: Arbitrary remote code execution — GLSA 201707-08
CVE-2017-7875.subTitle: A vulnerability in feh might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-7875.background: feh is an X11 image viewer aimed mostly at console users.
CVE-2017-7875.body: Tobias Stoeckmann discovered it was possible to trigger an out-of-boundary heap write with the image viewer feh while receiving an IPC message.
CVE-2017-7875.extra: A remote attacker, pretending to be the E17 window manager, could possibly trigger an out-of-boundary heap write in feh while receiving an IPC message. This could result in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-7885.title: jbig2dec: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code — GLSA 201708-10
CVE-2017-7885.subTitle: Multiple integer overflow flaws have been discovered in jbig2dec, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.
CVE-2017-7885.background: jbig2dec is a decoder implementation of the JBIG2 image compression format.
CVE-2017-7885.body: Integer overflow errors have been discovered in the jbig2_decode_symbol_dict, jbig2_build_huffman_table, and jbig2_image_compose functions of jbig2dec.
CVE-2017-7885.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to open a specially crafted JBIG2 file using an application linked against jbig2dec, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-7939.title: ImageWorsener: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201706-06
CVE-2017-7939.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in ImageWorsener, the worst of which allows remote attackers to cause a Denial of Service condition or have other unspecified impact.
CVE-2017-7939.background: ImageWorsener is a cross-platform command-line utility and library for image scaling and other image processing.
CVE-2017-7939.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in ImageWorsener. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.
CVE-2017-7939.extra: A remote attacker could entice a user to process a specially crafted image file using ImageWorsener, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition or have other unspecified impacts.

CVE-2017-7948.title: GPL Ghostscript: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201811-12
CVE-2017-7948.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GPL Ghostscript, the worst of which could result in the execution of arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-7948.background: Ghostscript is an interpreter for the PostScript language and for PDF.
CVE-2017-7948.body: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GPL Ghostscript. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for additional information.
CVE-2017-7948.extra: A context-dependent attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PostScript file or PDF document using GPL Ghostscript possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, a Denial of Service condition, or other unspecified impacts,

CVE-2017-9148.title: FreeRADIUS: Security bypass — GLSA 201706-27
CVE-2017-9148.subTitle: A vulnerability in FreeRADIUS might allow remote attackers to bypass authentication.
CVE-2017-9148.background: FreeRADIUS is an open source RADIUS authentication server.
CVE-2017-9148.body: It was discovered that the implementation of TTLS and PEAP in FreeRADIUS skips inner authentication when it handles a resumed TLS connection. The affected versions of FreeRADIUS fails to reliably prevent the resumption of unauthenticated sessions unless the TLS session cache is disabled completely.
CVE-2017-9148.extra: An unauthenticated remote user can bypass authentication by starting a session, and then resuming an unauthenticated TLS session before inner authentication has been completed successfully.

CVE-2017-9153.title: AutoTrace: Multiple vulnerabilities — GLSA 201708-09
CVE-2017-9153.subTitle: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in AutoTrace, the worst of which could cause a Denial of Service condition.
CVE-2017-9153.background: AutoTrace converts bitmap to vector graphics.
CVE-2017-9153.body: Heap-based buffer overflows have been discovered in the pstoedit_suffix_table_init and pnm_load_rawpbm functions of AutoTrace.
CVE-2017-9153.extra: Remote attackers, by enticing a user to process a crafted bmp image file, could cause a Denial of Service condition.

CVE-2017-9800.title: Subversion: Arbitrary code execution — GLSA 201709-09
CVE-2017-9800.subTitle: A command injection vulnerability in Subversion may allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.
CVE-2017-9800.background: Subversion is a version control system intended to eventually replace CVS. Like CVS, it has an optional client-server architecture (where the server can be an Apache server running mod_svn, or an ssh program as in CVS’s :ext: method). In addition to supporting the features found in CVS, Subversion also provides support for moving and copying files and directories.
CVE-2017-9800.body: Specially crafted ‘ssh://...’ URLs may allow the owner of the repository to execute arbitrary commands on client’s machine if those commands are already installed on the client’s system. This is especially dangerous when the third-party repository has one or more submodules with specially crafted ‘ssh://...’ URLs. Each time the repository is recursively cloned or submodules are updated the payload will be triggered.
CVE-2017-9800.extra: A remote attacker, by enticing a user to clone a specially crafted repository, could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.
